paper_abstract: We introduce a new method to compute conformal parameterizations using a recent definition of discrete conformity, and establish a discrete version of the Riemann mapping theorem. Our algorithm can parameterize triangular, quadrangular and digital meshes. It can also be adapted to preserve metric properties. To demonstrate the efficiency of our method, many examples are shown in the experiment section.
paper_title: Mesh Parameterization with Generalized Discrete Conformal Maps
